attributes.action: investigate the funding crisis that the British Ski and Snowboard teams find themselves in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the impending administration of Snowsport GB the British Ski and Snowboard team face an uncertain future.

As it stands many of the support teams for these athletes have unpaid salaries and expenses outstanding......even some of the athletes are owed money by the organisation!

The purpose of this petition is to raise the government's awareness of the issue and ask that they divert some of the vast attention, energy and resources being spent on the 2012 London Olympics to address this highly embarrassing situation.
